text:
Hello

I’m building out a resource centre on a non-HubSpot based website and using HubSpot embedded forms as the paywall for a user downloading a pdf resource.
As part of that function I’m hoping to be able to remove the form paywall if a user has already filled out the HubSpot form either for the current session or up until a  number of days have passed.

Does anyone know if I can achieve this with HubSpot embedded forms?
I’m wondering if HubSpot form submissions generate a session cookie or similar that I could read.
Thanks

-------
Curious :thinking_face:  What are the top 10 small (<$2K) website projects your team is contracted to do?
-------
